example.eg: A car swiped me coming out of the parking lot.
example.egtrans: 一辆车从停车场出来刮蹭到了我。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 碰擦，刮蹭, 击中，挥击

example.egtrans: 有人偷走了我的化学书。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 偷走, 顺手牵羊地拿走

example.eg: Swipe your card and enter your PIN on the keypad.
example.egtrans: 请刷卡并在键盘上输入您的密码。

dsense.name: swipe [sth]
dsense.guideword: (drag finger across: a touchscreen) (手指划过触摸屏)

example.eg: Swipe the screen to unlock your phone.
The boxer's swipe to the side of the head took his opponent by surprise.
example.egtrans: 拳击手出其不意地冲着对手头部侧面快速一击。

dsense.name: swipe left, swipe to the left
dsense.guideword: (on screen: drag finger to the left) (在屏幕上用手指)

example.eg: From the home screen, swipe left to access your messages.

dsense.name: swipe left
dsense.guideword: (on dating app: reject, dismiss) (指约会应用中)

dsense.name: swipe right, swipe to the right
dsense.guideword: (on screen: drag finger to the right) (在屏幕上用手指)

example.eg: He sounded nice, so I swiped right on him and now we're going on a date.
I was so enraged by the paparazzo that I took a swipe at him.
Critics have taken a swipe at the government's proposals, calling them unrealistic.
example.egtrans: 批评家抨击了政府的议案，称其并不现实。
